name: SpamJam
author: Utopique

sections.description:
SpamJam is an antispam that protects your comment and registration forms from being abused. It can prevent 99% of all automated spam requests, transparently for end-users.

As a result, you can enjoy a bloat-free database and finalyy enjoy your free time instead of spending hours dealing with spam entries.

SpamJam has also been created to be stealth, and totally invisible for legitimate users.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
0.5.1 – 2024-05-28

  • Add – WooCommerce HPOS support
  • Enhancement – optimize the main function to reduce plugin load.
  • Enhancement – PHPCS fixes.
  • Update – latest FS.

short_description: SpamJam stops comment spam and registration spam so you can sit back and enjoy your free time.
